message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.NI, cs.LG 

The paper deals with communication channels and their capacity, which falls under the information theory (cs.IT) sub-category. The paper also involves the study of state sequences and their impact on communication, which is related to the systems and control (cs.SY) sub-category. The use of examples involving Gaussian channels and joint design of communication phases suggests a possible connection to multimedia (cs.MM) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. Finally, the study of achievable rate-distortion-cost trade-offs and capacity-cost regions involves optimization and decision making, which is related to the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category.
